cloverDomain.label: Clover Domain
cloverDomain.help:
The Clover Domain is a **required** URL that will be used for API calls.

###### Example:

`https://www.clover.com`

###### Note:

This should be automatically populated when launching via the dashboard.

merchantId.label: Merchant ID
merchantId.title:
The Merchant ID should be a 13-character alphanumeric value.
Example: ABC1234567890
merchantId.help:
The Merchant ID is a **required** 13-character alphanumeric value.

###### Example:

`ABC1234567890`

For help finding this value, refer to [Use the Web Dashboard to manage your Clover account](https://www.clover.com/help/web-dashboard-for-managing-your-clover-account/#view-merchant-id-clover-id-device-serial-number-and)

###### Note:

This should be automatically populated when launching via the dashboard.

employeeId.label: Employee ID
employeeId.title:
The Employee ID should be a 13-character alphanumeric value.
Example: ABC1234567890
employeeId.help:
The Employee ID is an **optional** 13-character alphanumeric value.

###### Example:

`ABC1234567890`

###### Note:

This should be automatically populated when launching via the dashboard.

accessToken.label: Access Token
accessToken.title:
The Access Token should be a 32-character UUID value.
Example: 12345678-ABCD-1234-ABCD-1234-1234567890AB
Example: 12345678abcd1234abcd12341234567890ab
accessToken.help:
The Access Token is a **required** 32-character alphanumeric value.

###### Example:

`12345678abcd1234abcd12341234567890ab`

###### Note:

This should be automatically populated when launching via the dashboard.

raid.label: Remote Application ID
raid.title: The Remote Application ID should be 1 to 255 characters (alphanumeric, spaces, periods).
raid.help:
The Remote Application ID is a **required** value up to 255 characters in length (alphanumeric, spaces, periods).

###### Note:

This should be automatically populated when launching via the dashboard.

friendlyId.label: Friendly ID
friendlyId.help:
The Friendly ID is an **optional** value.

###### Example:

`Virtual Keypad`

cloudPayDisplay.uninstalled: Cloud Pay Display is NOT installed

ERROR.Merchant has no devices with Cloud Pay D: Merchant has no devices with Cloud Pay Display installed
ERROR.Device does not have Cloud Pay Display i: Device does not have Cloud Pay Display installed
